remarks: Distributive law for inner product.  Complex version of ~ ip2di . (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 16-Oct-2015.)
statement:
cphipcj.h $e |- ., = ( .i ` W ) $.
cphipcj.v $e |- V = ( Base ` W ) $.
cphdir.P $e |- .+ = ( +g ` W ) $.
cph2di.1 $e |- ( ph -> W e. CPreHil ) $.
cph2di.2 $e |- ( ph -> A e. V ) $.
cph2di.3 $e |- ( ph -> B e. V ) $.
cph2di.4 $e |- ( ph -> C e. V ) $.
cph2di.5 $e |- ( ph -> D e. V ) $.
cph2di $p |- ( ph -> ( ( A .+ B ) ., ( C .+ D ) ) = ( ( ( A ., C ) + ( B ., D ) ) + ( ( A ., D ) + ( B ., C ) ) ) ) $.
